title: lf duo
body:
hey all,

quick rundown:
- currently in bronze, have been in silver in previous seasons
- looking for a duo partner to start climbing with (im an adc main), and have only really started to play ranked this season
- happy to use whatever comms (skype, discord, curse, etc)
- ideally looking for a duo partner wanting to learn and climb with me or even someone whos wanting to coach, really open to learning :)

if youre keen just flick me an inv in game - revolutiontk

cheers!

replies.body: Im a support main in s2 atm. i added you in game.
